reports_summary: In one submission, reports suggest Voidtrain feels generally smooth on the Valve Steam Deck OLED when using a low/medium graphics mix, sitting in the mid‑40s FPS with only occasional dips toward 40; applying a 45 FPS cap helped keep pacing steady. Stability was acceptable during play, and power draw ran about 20 W, giving roughly two and a half hours per charge. The takeaway is that modest quality reductions rather than big changes to resolution keep the experience steady while preserving most of the visual character.
